ch0320_00_meroko/0101_0701_01_10:
Well if it ain’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You plannin’ to pick a fight with someone?
ch0320_00_meroko/0101_0701_02_10:
If you’re in trouble, I’m here to help. I could torch
’em to ashes for ya.
ch0320_00_meroko/7101_0701_01_10: For me and my friends, Team Star is our treasure.
ch0320_00_meroko/7101_0701_02_10:
Whatever shape it takes, I’m blazin’ with joy it can
still exist.
ch0320_00_meroko/7102_0701_02_10:
If you wanna solve a problem, you gotta
get movin’.
ch0320_00_meroko/7102_0701_03_10: Overthinkin’s a waste of time, don’tcha think?
ch0320_00_meroko/7103_0701_01_10:
I just love Fire-type Pokémon—and it’s not ’cause
I handle them for the team.
ch0320_00_meroko/7103_0701_02_10:
I’m big into flames—how they flicker and all.
You get what I’m sayin’, right?
ch0320_00_meroko/7104_0701_01_10:
I’ve a friend who’s, like, really good at
craftin’ things.
ch0320_00_meroko/7104_0701_02_10: It made me wanna try and make somethin’ myself.
ch0320_00_meroko/7104_0701_03_10: You’ve felt inspired like that, right?
ch0320_00_meroko/7105_0701_02_10:
And, um...I’d really like you to model for my
next piece.
ch0320_00_meroko/7105_0701_03_10: Wait, not YOU! I’m talkin’ to your Pokémon!
ch0320_00_meroko/7105_0701_04_10:
...Well, I guess since you’re its Trainer, you can,
like, stand next to it or somethin’.
ch0320_00_meroko/1701_0701_01_10:
You and your partner are all pumped up,
aren’tcha.
ch0320_00_meroko/1701_0702_01_10:
But lemme make one thing clear—I’m not givin’
this to YOU...
ch0320_00_meroko/1701_0702_02_10: I’m givin’ it to your partner.
ch0320_00_meroko/2501_0701_01_10:
So, uh... There are painters and artists on Pasio,
right?
ch0320_00_meroko/2501_0701_02_10:
I’m part of an art club, so I kinda wanna ask them
for painting tips.
ch0320_00_meroko/2501_0701_03_10: Is it weird to just...walk up and ask?
ch0320_00_meroko/2501_0702_01_10:
I only just started painting, so I’m not that
good yet.
ch0320_00_meroko/2501_0702_02_10:
But someday, I wanna paint a piece I’m satisfied
with.
ch0320_00_meroko/2501_0702_03_10: And when I do...I’ll show it to you, so be ready.
ch0320_00_meroko/2511_0701_02_10: That’s all we used to think about.
ch0320_00_meroko/2511_0701_03_10:
We never thought about what would happen after
burnin’ everythin’ down.
ch0320_00_meroko/2511_0702_01_10:
If you wanna shine bright, you shouldn’t try to
change people.
ch0320_00_meroko/2511_0702_02_10:
You gotta change yourself. I learned that the
hard way.
ch0320_00_meroko/2511_0702_03_10: That’s why I’m plannin’ to go to school again.
ch0320_00_meroko/2511_0702_04_10: So I can make my dream come true.
ch0320_00_meroko/3001_0701_01_10:
You’re burnin’ too bright for so early in the day.
S’hotter than the sun...
ch0320_00_meroko/3003_0701_01_10:
Gettin’ fired up’s fine and all...just don’t burn
yourself out before night rolls around.
ch0320_00_meroko/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s almost time to call it quits for the day.
How ’bout we go out with a blast?
